# Welcome {-}

Welcome to MA22004 Statistics II at the University of Dundee. 

This module covers the basics of statistical inference including point estimation, interval estimation, hypothesis testing, linear regression, and simple goodness-of-fit tests. The appendix contains a list of curated content for your to investigate.

These notes are available at [dundeemath.github.io/MA22004/](https://dundeemath.github.io/MA22004/) and also as a PDF (visit the page and click on the PDF icon to download).
